tgt_original: hattvā rāgaṃ virāgaṃ ca sarvasaukhyaṃ vadanti te ||68 ||
yadapyuktam - rāgapratipakṣā aśubhāḥ,  dveṣapratipakṣo maitrī,  mohapratipakṣaḥ pratītyasamutpādaḥ |
tatra rāgato virāga vinivṛttiḥ,  tadviruddhatvāditi cet,na |
yadi tathā dhruvamanya rāgasātmīkaraṇe'  pi virāgaḥ syāt |  ata evoktaṃ mūlatantre -

anyathā na srotāpannasya mārgapratilambhaḥ syāt,  tasya rāgādyaparihāreṇa pravṛtteḥ |  kiñca evamuktaṃ bhagavatā śīlapaṭale - bodhisattvena daśakuśalānyapi parārthena khaṇḍayitavyāni |  yathā-kācit kāmārthinī strī bodhisattvaṃ prati prāṇān tyajet,  tasyāḥ kāmādisevanena prāṇasandhāraṇaṃ kāryam |
yathā ketakīpuṣpaṃ gandhahastinopabhuktaṃ kastūrikādi bhāvena pariṇamate,
itaraiśca hastibhirupabhujyamānaṃ asevyabhāvena pariṇāmayati |  tena na tatra ketakīpuṣpadoṣaḥ |
tathā rāgādayo'  pi viśuddhasantānavartino viśiṣṭameva phalaṃ kurvanti,  āśayaviśeṣayogāt |
